description: Along Tanjong Rhu View, 12 colourful signs were put up by a team of seven resident volunteersÂ in January. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 'Your grandfather's road?': Volunteers in Mountbatten put up signs to deter illegal parking
title_page: 'Your grandfather's road?': Volunteers in Mountbatten put up signs to deter illegal parking | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Along Tanjong Rhu View, 12 colourful signs have attracted attention and piqued curiosity.
On one, a smug blue creature warns motorists: "Park here to say 'hello' to parking fine."
